casebody.data:
John MOLLAGHAN, et al., petitioners,
v.
Sonya VARNELL, Individually and Officially, Estate of Dr. Horace Fleming, Deceased, et al. No. 12-1238. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 105 So.3d 291.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Mississippi denied.
